commands.name: az site-recovery replication-eligibility list
commands.summary: List whether a given VM can be protected or not in which case returns list of errors.
examples: az site-recovery replication-eligibility list -g rg --virtual-machine-name vm_name

commands.name: az site-recovery replication-eligibility show-default
commands.summary: Get whether a given VM can be protected or not in which case returns list of errors.
examples: az site-recovery replication-eligibility show-default -g rg --virtual-machine-name vm_name
